item.title: 'Hades II' Is Coming to Nintendo Switch This Month
item.description: Nintendo made a slew of announcements during its latest Direct event, including details on a new Resident Evil game, a Ditto-centric Pokémon title, and more details on Hades II.

item.title: The Nintendo Switch 2’s Biggest Problem Is Already Storage
item.description: In 2025, 256 gigabytes just isn’t enough, and tacking on more storage isn’t as easy as it sounds.
